def_en: A necklace is a piece of jewellery such as a chain or a string of beads which someone, usually a woman, wears round their neck.

def_cn: 给…戴火项链(指将淋了汽油的轮胎套在某人脖子上并点燃的私刑)
def_en: To necklace someone means to kill them by putting a tyre soaked in petrol around their neck and then setting fire to it.
